alert.note: Alert for Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 10:42PM MST until January 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected from Sunday evening through Monday morning. Areas of blowing snow will be possible during this time period dropping visibilities below half a mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
